APPLICATION
Testnet

Groundbreaking AI-driven DeFi Asset Management Tool

Fenture.io is a super-charged, autonomous DeFi protocol that spawns crypto economy with innovative, AI-driven financial tools built on Aptos and Sui.

The protocol focuses on sustainable, self-learning mechanisms to encourage long-term staking and providing liquidity.

The Fenture Ecosystem

BONDING

With decentralized and non-custodial staking, bonding allows users to trade various crypto assets for FFD at a discounted price. In exchange to the bond sales, the treasury grows, providing stability to the protocol and yield generation opportunities for FFD holders.

STAKING

Staking plays a crucial part in the Fenture Ecosystem. FFD has a variable rate of return, through smart contract autonomous automations, treasury assets backing and the deployment of resources in new and early-stage crypto ventures. Stakers receive their pro-rata share of rebases in exchange for their contributions for the stability of the protocol.

Decentralized Asset Management

Fenture utilizes a combination of governance and autonomous, AI driven portfolio management strategies to maximize returns on treasury investments. With Fenture, you will earn consistent yields from a range of democratized new crypto investments through FFD.

Fenture Finance Token (FFD)

Staking

Users can stake some of their FFD holdings and earn consistent rewards over time as passive income.

Bonding

With decentralized and non-custodial staking, bonding allows users to trade various crypto assets for FFD at a discounted price. In exchange to the bond sales, the treasury grows, providing stability to the protocol and yield generation opportunities for FFD holders.

Fully Mortgaged

FFD is fully mortgaged because it is backed by crypto assets on the chain in the scope of Fenture DAO. The intrinsic value of FFD is backed by the protocol’s total asset under management.

Self- Learning Algorithm Control

When FFD trades at a premium, the protocol will mint FFD and sell it in the open market to increase supply and drive down prices. If FFD trades at a discounted price,the DAO will buy back tokens to reduce supply.

Fenture DAO

What is Fenture DAO

Fenture Dao is a DeFi asset management protocol that allows our backers to securely invest in different crypto assets through AI driven strategies and getting access to early-stage projects, with the value accrual will be demonstrated via staking rewards, bonding rewards as well as token buybacks.

Staking Fenture Dao: Vote-Escrowed FFD (Fenture Finance DAO Token)

Participating in Fenture Dao governance requires that an account has FFD tokens. Community can create a vote for governance and control of the protocol admin functionality.

Fenture DAO: Fees Collection and Distribution

The Vote-Escrowed FFD comes from three types of income from the protocol – Swap Fees, FFD Bonded Treasury, and Incubation Income. The balance will be demonstrated on chain directly.

Fenture DAO: Vote for Underlying Assets

 

80% of the underlying assets will be kept on chain publicly. Community can make a vote on how the protocol should allocate the assets accordingly, with recommendations from our AI self learning algorithms. For example, we can allocate more assets to purchase APT because the community believe in its long term value. 20% of the underlying assets will be used to participate in seed round/private round and incubation to create a diversified portfolio of the protocol.
